com.bonitasoft.engine.api

Interface ReportingAPI


  • public interface ReportingAPI
    This API gives access to all reporting features. Reporting is a way to execute custom queries on Bonita BPM Database, knowing the DB structure, for custom specific queries.

    Only "select" statements are allowed.

    Also allows to manipulate Reports, through creation, deletion, search.

    Author:
    Matthieu Chaffotte, Celine Souchet, Emmanuel Duchastenier
    See Also:
    Report

    • Method Detail

      • selectList

        String selectList(String selectQuery)
                  throws ExecutionException
        Executes a SELECT query (rollback only) and returns the result in a CSV format.

        If the query is not a SELECT one a RetrieveException is thrown. The result can differ from a database to another one due to the way the database stores values. (for example: with a boolean it can be a number for some databases)

        Parameters:
        selectQuery - the SELECT query.
        Returns:
        the result of the query in a CSV format.
        Throws:
        ExecutionException - if an exception occurs during the execution of the query.

      • getReport

        Report getReport(long reportId)
                 throws ReportNotFoundException
        Retrieves a report from its ID.
        Parameters:
        reportId - the Identifier of the report to retrieve
        Returns:
        the found report
        Throws:
        ReportNotFoundException - if no report can be found with the provided ID.

      • getReportContent

        byte[] getReportContent(long reportId)
                        throws ReportNotFoundException
        Retrieves the binary content of a report.
        Parameters:
        reportId - the ID of the report to extract the content for.
        Returns:
        the binary content of the report.
        Throws:
        ReportNotFoundException - if no report can be found with the provided ID.

      • searchReports

        SearchResult<Report> searchReports(SearchOptions searchOptions)
                                   throws SearchException
        Searches for reports with specific search criteria.
        Parameters:
        searchOptions - the search options for the search. See SearchOptions for search option details.
        Returns:
        the SearchResult containing
        Throws:
        SearchException - if a problem occurs during the search.

      • createReport

        Report createReport(String name,
                  String description,
                  byte[] content)
                    throws AlreadyExistsException,
                           CreationException
        Creates a new report with no screenshot.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the report.
        description - the description of the report, ready to be displayed.
        content - the binary content of the report.
        Returns:
        the newly created report.
        Throws:
        AlreadyExistsException - if a report with this name already exists.
        CreationException - if an error occurs during the creation.
        See Also:
        createReport(ReportCreator, byte[])

      • createReport

        Report createReport(ReportCreator reportCreator,
                  byte[] content)
                    throws AlreadyExistsException,
                           CreationException
        Creates a custom report.
        Parameters:
        reportCreator - the creator object to instantiate the new report.
        content - the binary content of the report.
        Returns:
        the newly created report.
        Throws:
        AlreadyExistsException - if a report with this name already exists.
        CreationException - if an error occurs during the creation.

      • deleteReport

        void deleteReport(long reportId)
                  throws DeletionException
        Deletes a report identified by its ID.
        Parameters:
        reportId - the report identifier to delete.
        Throws:
        DeletionException - if a problem occurs during deletion.

      • deleteReports

        void deleteReports(List<Long> reportIds)
                   throws DeletionException
        Deletes a list of reports, given by their IDs.
        Parameters:
        reportIds - a list of report identifiers to delete.
        Throws:
        DeletionException - if a problem occurs during deletion.
